name: Basics
desc: Applet is a special type of program that is embedded in the webpage to generate the dynamic content. It runs inside the browser and works at client side.

name: Graphics
desc: java.awt.Graphics class provides many methods for graphics programming.

name: Image
desc: Applet is mostly used in games and animation. For this purpose image is required to be displayed. The java.awt.Graphics class provide a method drawImage() to display the image.

name: Animation
desc: Applet is mostly used in games and animation.

name: EventHandling
desc: As we perform event handling in AWT or Swing, we can perform it in applet also.

name: Painting
desc: We can perform painting operation in applet by the mouseDragged() method of MouseMotionListener.

name: Digital clock
desc: Digital clock can be created by using the Calendar and SimpleDateFormat class.

name: Analog clock
desc: Analog clock can be created by using the Math class.

name: Applet Communication
desc: java.applet.AppletContext class provides the facility of communication between applets. We provide the name of applet through the HTML file. It provides getApplet() method that returns the object of Applet.

name: Parameter
desc: We can get any information from the HTML file as a parameter. For this purpose, Applet class provides a method named getParameter().
